overall_summary: ElizaOS is transitioning into its 'V2' architecture while expanding its footprint beyond crypto into general-purpose AI agent capabilities, including gaming and 3D avatar generation. Technical focus remains on infrastructure stabilization, performance optimization of the SQL plugin, and the introduction of a unified messaging API.
key_facts: Shaw demonstrated Eliza functioning as a reinforcement learning agent and in-game NPC capable of tasks like chopping wood.
Jin announced a new beta feature for contributor profiles providing lifetime summaries for AI council reviews.
PR #6351 was opened to establish the V2.0.0 branch, removing non-essentials and focusing on TypeScript and Rust runtimes.
ElizaCloud enabled weather data API integration and operationalized payment infrastructure.
Multiple users reported that the 'max' button in the AI16z-to-ElizaOS token migration interface is non-functional.
Developer standujar implemented unified client hooks with multi-transport support for HTTP, SSE, and WebSocket.
The planned Jeju layer launch is targeted for H2 2026 with gas fees denominated in $elizaOS tokens.
Contributor 0xbbjoker resolved a critical SQL parameterization issue in the SQL plugin affecting data isolation.
open_questions: What model you use for the generation?
Can this be done in Eliza cloud now? Or local installation? How do?
What price level is the foundation targeting for 2026?
How do I set Discord Timer/Interval Settings for my elizaos agents in discord?
Do you need Twitter API to use Eliza to run a Twitter agent?
Can I top up credit into the cloud now with the billing pages?

twitter_news_highlights.claim: X platform announced upcoming built-in price tracking for crypto tokens and stocks directly in the timeline.

new_issues_prs.title: V2.0.0
new_issues_prs.author: lalalune
new_issues_prs.significance: Major architectural shift removing app/server/CLI to focus on Rust/TS runtime.

new_issues_prs.title: feat: add plugin-blockrun for x402 micropayments
new_issues_prs.author: 1bcMax
new_issues_prs.significance: Enables pay-per-request AI calls using USDC on Base chain.

new_issues_prs.title: feat: unified hooks with multi-transport support
new_issues_prs.author: standujar
new_issues_prs.significance: Simplifies client builds by providing a consistent interface for HTTP, SSE, and WebSocket.

overall_focus.claim: Optimization of runtime initialization and database performance, specifically using UPSERT patterns and prevention of cartesian products in SQL queries.

discord_updates.summary: Demonstrated 3D avatar generation system with low poly mode. Clarified that agents use separate human simulator/evaluator components rather than traditional subagent architecture.
Philosophical debates on generational crypto adoption timelines (50+ years) and the strategic separation of political content from project social accounts.

user_feedback.feedback_summary: Users reported inability to swap tokens due to a broken UI in the migration portal.
Reported issue where agents continuously reintroduce themselves instead of progressing through 5-phase execution flows.

strategic_insights.insight: Development is intentionally moving Eliza toward becoming a 'general purpose agent' to avoid market stagnation.
implications_or_questions: How will this shift affect initial crypto-focused product-market fit?

strategic_insights.insight: There is a significant push for local-first alternatives to Claude Code (e.g., Clawdbot) to bypass reliance on managed services.
implications_or_questions: Does the community have the infrastructure to support AGI achieved locally?

market_analysis.observation: Structural downward price pressure noted due to daily minting for contributors without active gas fee utility.
market_analysis.relevance: Token economics are currently suffering from a utility gap that the Jeju layer aims to close in late 2026.
